channel.title: Auto-Kick
channel.description:
Well.. I dunno what went wrong.. I can play my server fine by myself and when someone else logs in, it is fine. If we get near each other though, it logs us both out.
Anyone know what is wrong?
-Alexia

item.title: Auto-Kick
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

Thanks for the help guys. I dunno what went wrong, but I gave up (none of that worked) and started over on a new and improved client.

-Alexia

Read full topic

item.title: Auto-Kick
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Here use these for each type of file you use:

runserver.bat:

@echo off title alexia Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

compile.bat:

@echo off COLOR 08 title alexia compiler "F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

run&compile.bat:

@echo off COLOR 02 title alexia client "F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "F:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin/java.exe" server pause

Now in order to make these work you need the newest version of java. Download it at this link:

http://sdlc-esd.sun.com/ESD28/JSCDL/jdk/1.5.0_09_b03/jdk-1_5_0_09-windows-i586-p.exe?AuthParam=1161401165_24143ad4ae5385b82df4310e284ffcdb&TUrl=an1npDpbKod7kSYrROhENTonIeY1W0D1Lc4nXz+pGFFranixdCdgxDTPbW4=&TicketId=dlZ3OQVINeE/+Q==&GroupName=SDLC&BHost=sdlc6i.sun.com&FilePath=/ESD28/JSCDL/jdk/1.5.0_09_b03/jdk-1_5_0_09-windows-i586-p.exe&File=jdk-1_5_0_09-windows-i586-p.exe

There ya go. Enjoy!

~Mod Taharok

Read full topic

item.title: Auto-Kick
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

I don’t even use runserver… I just run the compile and it starts the server.

Should I still add that?

-Alexia | Yes, I know that I am a complete idiot.[br][size=1]Posted at: October 20, 2006, 03:45:40 PM[/size][hr]Okay… I just updated that first post with some new information. It is really strange.

-Alexia

Read full topic

item.title: Auto-Kick
item.dc:creator: @welshy welshy
item.description:
@welshy wrote:

add this to your runserver if you dont have it java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
